12.text: And you are to tell him

14.text: But I scattered them with a whirlwind
so that no one could come

11.text: as I did in the past

8.text: because of those who march to and fro

5.text: and they will put the horsemen

8.text: and they will be as numerous

5.text: I was purchased as a servant

10.text: but Jerusalem will be raised up
